description.brief: Unpredictable entropic force that ignores resistances and creates random effects, representing pure mystical instability.
description.detailed: Chaos damage embodies the destructive force of entropy and mystical corruption. It bypasses most conventional defenses by attacking the fundamental stability of matter and energy. Chaos damage is inherently unpredictable, with effects that can vary wildly between applications, making it both powerful and dangerous to wield.
description.visual_effects: Swirling purple and black energy with crackling distortions, reality tears, and unstable particle effects
description.lore_explanation: Chaos damage draws from the mystical fractures and paradoxes left by the Great Convergence. It represents the antithesis of order, seeking to unravel the carefully maintained stability of post-Convergence reality.

status_effects.description: Target suffers random negative effects that change over time
Target's resistances are randomly shuffled every 2 seconds
Target may skip turns or act multiple times randomly

resistances.penetration_mechanics: Chaos damage ignores physical defenses and most resistances

interactions.conditions: When chaos and holy damage interact

interactions.result: Creates reality tears that deal massive chaos damage
interactions.conditions: When mystical fractures are corrupted by chaos

mystical_aspects.mist-walker_synergy: Destabilizes mystical abilities, can cause unpredictable mystical effects
mystical_aspects.mystical_enhancement: mystical manipulation can focus chaos into more predictable patterns

enemy_vulnerabilities.vulnerability_reason: Chaos directly opposes their stabilizing nature

build_archetypes.focus: High-risk, high-reward damage with unpredictable effects
Battlefield control through unpredictable chaos effects
